cleaned_text: Description - Jadience Herbal Formulas Meditation Soak releases blocked energy from deep within your body and allows chi to flow optimally throughout your body. Your mind will become clear and focused while your body will become deeply relaxed, allowing you to attain a true meditative state. - Immerse yourself in this wonderful bath of Asian herbs that is designed to help you achieve a deeper and more rewarding meditation experience. Ingredients: Herbal Sinensis), Caprylyl Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Jade Powder Suggested Usage: - For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour the desired amount of contents into a very warm bath (at least 1/4 of the bottle). Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. - Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. - For best results, remain in the bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself. - Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance. Warnings: Keep out of reach of children. * These statements have not been evaluated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to treat, mitigate, diagnose or cure any disease.
